GSD.product_version: versions from v4.9 to before v5.4.207
GSD.description:
xen/netback: avoid entering xenvif_rx_next_skb() with an empty rx queue

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.207 by commit 7425479d20f9e96f7c3ec8e8a93fe0d7478724cb, it was introduced in version v4.9 by commit 98f6d57ced73b723551568262019f1d6c8771f20. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: xen/netback: avoid entering xenvif_rx_next_skb() with an empty rx queue
OSV.details:
